trans-unit.source: Manages configuration element content in connection with the activation of a service application.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceActivationElement"></xref> class.

Configures a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceActivationElement"></xref> class that includes a service activation file directory location that is relative to a base URL.
A file directory location that requires being referenced from a base URL.
Configures a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceActivationElement"></xref> class that includes the specified service to be activated and its relative address.
A URL location that requires being referenced from a base address.
The service application that becomes activated.

Configures a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceActivationElement"></xref> class with the specified service to be activated, its relative address, and the system path name of a factory that generates a service activation element.
A URL location that requires being reference from a base address.
The CLR type name of the factory that generates a service activation element.
Gets or sets a configuration string that contains the CLR type name of the factory that generates a service activation element.
The configuration string that contains the CLR type name of the factory.
Gets or sets the relative address of a service activation file.
The relative address of a service activation file.
Gets or sets the name of the service application.
The name of a service application.
